News.headline: Sunday Football At The Daggers: Sunday 12th February
News.page_title: Sunday Football At The Daggers: Sunday 12th February
News.URL_keywords: Sunday Football At The Daggers: Sunday 12th February
News.short_description: Enjoy a packed Sunday of football at the Daggers Bar.
News.description:
Football Sundays will be back between 1:00-7:00pm on Sunday with two games from the Premier League being shown live on Sky Sports. At 13:30pm Burnley will host league leaders Chelsea at Turf Moor with Burnley last losing at home on 26th November 2016. Then at 16:00pm Swansea City host Leicester City at the Liberty Stadium in an important game with both sides only one point above the relegation zone going into this weekends Premier League games.

Take advantage of the Football Sundays offers on selected drinks at £2.49, which include; Carling, Cask Ale, Bottle Coors, Carling English Cider and Koppaberg. 

These offers are open to members only. Season ticket holders are automatically members but anyone wishing to buy a membership on the day can do so by asking a member of bar staff. So make sure you buy your membership for just £2!
